org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm

Interface AsmContigBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<AsmContig>, ContigBuilder<AsmAssembledRead,AsmContig>

    public interface AsmContigBuilder
extends ContigBuilder<AsmAssembledRead,AsmContig>
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setDegenerate

      • isDegenerate

      • addRead

        AsmContigBuilder addRead(String readId,
                         String validBases,
                         int offset,
                         Direction dir,
                         Range clearRange,
                         int ungappedFullLength,
                         boolean isSurrogate)
        Add a read to this contig with the given values. This read can later get modified via the ContigBuilder.getAssembledReadBuilder(String).
        Parameters:
        readId - the Id this read should have
        validBases - the gapped bases of this read that align (however well/badly) to this contig and will be used as underlying sequence data for this contig.
        offset - the gapped start offset of this read into the contig consensus.
        dir - the Direction of this read.
        clearRange - the ungapped clear range of the valid bases relative to the full length non-trimmed raw full length read from the sequence machine.
        ungappedFullLength - the ungapped full length non-trimmed raw full length read from the sequence machine.
        isSurrogate - true if this read is a surrogate Read; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        this.
